mapper.select: SELECT CD_IDX ,CD_SUBJECT ,CD_DEPSTEP1 ,CD_DEPSTEP2 ,CD_DEPSTEP3 FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT WHERE CD_USE = 'Y' AND CD_DEPSTEP3 = '00' AND CD_DEPSTEP1 <= '10' AND CD_DEPSTEP1 <> '03' OR (CD_DEPSTEP1 > '10' AND CD_DEPSTEP2 = '00') OR (CD_DEPSTEP1 = '03' AND CD_DEPSTEP2 = '00') ORDER BY CD_DEPSTEP1, CD_DEPSTEP2

SELECT CD_IDX , CD_SUBJECT , CD_ENG_SUBJECT , CD_CHI_SUBJECT , CD_DEPSTEP1 , CD_DEPSTEP2 , CD_DEPSTEP3 , CD_TEL , (SELECT SUBSTR(MIN(CONCAT(LPAD(CE_SORT,3,'0'),CE_NAME)),4) FROM EZ_EMPLOYEE WHERE CE_CDIDX = A.CD_IDX AND CE_USE='Y') AS CE_NAME FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT A ORDER BY CD_DEPSTEP1,CD_DEPSTEP2,CD_DEPSTEP3

SELECT CD_IDX ,CD_SUBJECT ,CONCAT(CD_DEPSTEP1 , CD_DEPSTEP2 , CD_DEPSTEP3) AS CD_DEPSTEP ,CD_DEPSTEP1 ,CD_DEPSTEP2 ,CD_DEPSTEP3 ,CD_TEXT ,CD_USE ,CD_DATE ,CD_UPDATE ,CD_CODE ,CD_TEL ,CD_FAX ,CD_AREA ,CD_HOMEPAGE ,CD_ENG_SUBJECT ,CD_CHI_SUBJECT FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT WHERE CD_USE = 'Y' AND CD_DEPSTEP1 = #{cdDepstep1} AND CD_DEPSTEP2 = #{cdDepstep2} AND CD_DEPSTEP3 = #{cdDepstep3} ORDER BY CD_DEPSTEP1, CD_DEPSTEP2, CD_DEPSTEP3
